name: God Eater Off Shot: Soma-Hen Twin Pack & Anime Vol. 4
name_original: God Eater Off Shot: Soma-Hen Twin Pack & Anime Vol. 4
description:
God Eater Off Shot: Soma-Hen Twin Pack & Anime Vol. 4 is an arcade game developed by Bandai Namco Entertainment. It came out on 28-01-2016. Bandai Namco Entertainment published the game.
You can play God Eater Off Shot: Soma-Hen Twin Pack & Anime Vol. 4 on PlayStation 4.
